FuncDef: The reset ipv6 neighbors remote-backup command clears remote backup entries.
CLIs: reset ipv6 neighbors remote-backup { { interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } } | all }

ParaDef.Info:
Clear the remote backup entries on a specified interface name.
-

Specifies the type and number of a interface.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To clear the existing remote backup entries, run the reset ipv6 neighbors remote-backup command.
